docs.title: 前言
docs.text:
• 计算机网络
  • 应用层
    • HTTP
    • SFTP
  • 表示层
  • 传输层
    • TCP
    • UTP
  • 网络层
    • IP
  • 数据链路层
  • 物理层
  • 操作系统
  • 编程基础
  • 数据库
  • 中间件
  • 项目

docs.title: Specifications
docs.text:
a)
access-list 1 deny 170.16.40.0 0.0.0.255
access-list 1 permit 170.16.0.0 0.0.255.255
interface Ethernet1/0
ip access-group 1 in

b)
access-list 2 deny ip host 170.16.10.5 host 170.16.80.16
access-list 2 permit ip any any
interface Ethernet1/0
ip access-group 2 in

access-list 1 permit 192.168.2.2 interface Ethernet0/0 ip access-group 1 in
